sentences.sContent: You must love everything that contributes to the glory and honour of the fatherland.
sentences.sContent_eng: You must love everything that contributes to the glory and honour of the fatherland.
sentences.sCn: 你一定要热爱那些,能为祖国增添光荣和辉煌的事物

sentences.sContent: Then will all the earth be your fatherland, and all your work and effort spread forth blessings.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then will all the earth be your fatherland, and all your work and effort spread forth blessings.
sentences.sCn: 那么普天之下到处都是你们的祖国，你们所有的工作和努力都会遍地开花，造福天下。

trans.tranOther: the place where someone or their family was born
